author: lektran
msg: When scheduling a service to be run do it within it's own transaction.

This resolves a bug I encountered where a long running (couple of minutes) service was scheduling jobs but the poller was unable to get a lock on those JobSandbox rows which prevented the poller from queuing any jobs at all for the duration of the service.

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-2092 fixed the bug of camel-velocity remembering the last called resource's URI
